title: kriptokar
author: kriptokar
created_time: December 19, 2022, 11:35:42 AMLast edit: January 18, 2024, 09:16:57 AM by kriptokar
content: EscrowDapp.comCrypto Escrow ServiceA web3 tool that acts as a neutral third party between buyer and seller to protect both parties from potential fraudulent actions of the other by using smart contract on blockchain.ðŸ”¹Secure & TrustfullOpen source code, on-chain transactions with verified smart contract; safely store fundsðŸ”¹MultichainThanks to EVM compatible blockchains; we are running on Avalanche, BNB Smart Chain, Ethereum, Fantom, Polygon, Viction chains.ðŸ”¹Don't Trust, VerifyA decentralized escrow would be an independent mechanism that would remove the need for human interaction, or at least cut it down to a minimum.Â That is main reason why decentralized escrow will be the core part of the future.ðŸ”¹You Are In ControlAdvantage of decentralization and smart contract; no governing entity controls your funds, no one can prevent you from withdrawing your funds.LinksWeb | App | Twitter | Medium | Github | Audit | Whitepaper

comments.author: Commguard
comments.body: I can help you reach more people for your service and grow, through social media marketing services.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Very interesting service. However, when trying to visit your website I get the following error message from my browser: "SSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATION".

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: Quote from: Ormosisdotcom on December 21, 2022, 12:28:25 PMVery interesting service. However, when trying to visit your website I get the following error message from my browser: "SSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATION".It should be due to your browser. Try with another browswer please or try to google search the error + your browser name to fix.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: kriptokar on January 10, 2023, 04:49:27 PMUpFYI, you have an SSL issue:QuoteAn error occurred during a connection to www.escrowdapp.com. Peer attempted old style (potentially vulnerable) handshake.Error code: SSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONÂ  Â  The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.Â  Â  Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.I look forward to checking this out once this is resolved.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.created_time: January 10, 2023, 05:35:45 PMLast edit: January 12, 2023, 12:11:57 PM by kriptokar
comments.body: QuoteI look forward to checking this out once this is resolved.As I answered before, you have issue with your browser. Probably you are using Firefox. Please google search â€œSSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONâ€ and find how to fix. The website is live and working smoothly.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: kriptokar on January 10, 2023, 05:35:45 PMQuote from: BenCodie on January 10, 2023, 05:10:58 PMQuote from: kriptokar on January 10, 2023, 04:49:27 PMUpFYI, you have an SSL issue:QuoteAn error occurred during a connection to www.escrowdapp.com. Peer attempted old style (potentially vulnerable) handshake.Error code: SSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONÂ  Â  The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.Â  Â  Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.I look forward to checking this out once this is resolved.As I answered before, you have issue with your browser. Probably you are using Firefox. Please google search â€œSSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONâ€ and find how to fix. The website is live and working smoothly. Noted. I have tried this and resolved the issue. I apologize for the post. I do want to ask why you are using an old, insecure TLS version? Why not just update to a modern standard?

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.created_time: January 11, 2023, 06:33:53 AMLast edit: January 12, 2023, 12:11:39 PM by kriptokar
comments.body: QuoteNoted. I have tried this and resolved the issue. I apologize for the post. I do want to ask why you are using an old, insecure TLS version? Why not just update to a modern standard?I have no idea what cause your issue. Never heard from anyone the same. SSL is up to date and works smoothly.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: kriptokar on January 11, 2023, 06:33:53 AMQuote from: BenCodie on January 11, 2023, 05:45:52 AMQuote from: kriptokar on January 10, 2023, 05:35:45 PMQuote from: BenCodie on January 10, 2023, 05:10:58 PMQuote from: kriptokar on January 10, 2023, 04:49:27 PMUpFYI, you have an SSL issue:QuoteAn error occurred during a connection to www.escrowdapp.com. Peer attempted old style (potentially vulnerable) handshake.Error code: SSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONÂ  Â  The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.Â  Â  Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.I look forward to checking this out once this is resolved.As I answered before, you have issue with your browser. Probably you are using Firefox. Please google search â€œSSL_ERROR_UNSAFE_NEGOTIATIONâ€ and find how to fix. The website is live and working smoothly. Noted. I have tried this and resolved the issue. I apologize for the post. I do want to ask why you are using an old, insecure TLS version? Why not just update to a modern standard?I have no idea what cause your issue. Never heard from anyone the same. SSL is up to date and works smoothly. Interesting. From my research the main cause was said to be using an older TLS version which the browser refuses to support. If the SSL being used is modern and is using a modern TLS encryption method/version, then this might just be an odd anomaly. I have never experienced this before on my browser personally hence I thought it was an issue on your end. Sorry about that.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.created_time: January 12, 2023, 11:17:07 AMLast edit: January 12, 2023, 12:11:11 PM by kriptokar
comments.body: QuoteInteresting. From my research the main cause was said to be using an older TLS version which the browser refuses to support. If the SSL being used is modern and is using a modern TLS encryption method/version, then this might just be an odd anomaly. I have never experienced this before on my browser personally hence I thought it was an issue on your end. Sorry about that. No problem and same here; I havenâ€™t heard this error in my entire life

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: You are having more than one thread or Announcement in one board and worse still you bump all of them. This is not allowed as it's considered spam and might lead to the deletion of one of the threads by mods.Please delete and lock one thread or move it to archival board.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.created_time: January 18, 2023, 09:02:55 PMLast edit: January 18, 2023, 09:53:10 PM by kriptokar
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 18, 2023, 08:48:23 PMYou are having more than one thread or Announcement in one board and worse still you bump all of them. This is not allowed as it's considered spam and might lead to the deletion of one of the threads by mods.Please delete and lock one thread or move it to archival board.I didnt notice, sorry. I thought its on economy > services thread.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: kriptokar on January 18, 2023, 09:02:55 PMI didnt notice, sorry. I thought its on economy > services thread. No problem.Just in case you are wondering why the thread was moved back to Service Announcements (Altcoins) from Service board. It's because the service board is dedicated to services that involve mainly Bitcoin. Your service deals with altcoins, so this is a suitable board.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 20, 2023, 11:06:39 AMQuote from: kriptokar on January 18, 2023, 09:02:55 PMI didnt notice, sorry. I thought its on economy > services thread. No problem.Just in case you are wondering why the thread was moved back to Service Announcements (Altcoins) from Service board. It's because the service board is dedicated to services that involve mainly Bitcoin. Your service deals with altcoins, so this is a suitable board.App can escrow wrapped Bitcoin on Ethereum, TomoChain and BSC. So doesn't it count BTC service too?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: kriptokar on January 20, 2023, 02:22:40 PMApp can escrow wrapped Bitcoin on Ethereum, TomoChain and BSC. So doesn't it count BTC service too?No. Wrapped bitcoin is considered an altcoin since is a token on Ethereum, TomoChain, BSC or any other chains. It's not considered the real bitcoin by many. At least that's the logic they follow for Wrapped Bitcoin.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 21, 2023, 08:54:26 AMQuote from: kriptokar on January 20, 2023, 02:22:40 PMApp can escrow wrapped Bitcoin on Ethereum, TomoChain and BSC. So doesn't it count BTC service too?No. Wrapped bitcoin is considered an altcoin since is a token on Ethereum, TomoChain, BSC or any other chains. It's not considered the real bitcoin by many. At least that's the logic they follow for Wrapped Bitcoin.Right. Thanks for the clarificiation.

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: Good news! We got funding from TomoMasterDAO.We'll integrate our web2 marketplace to our main dapp. We'll be fully web3 in near future!

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: EscrowDapp v2 is loadingâ€¦â€¢ New landing page and rebranded design: %80 completed. â€¢ Development (integrate marketplace to main dapp): %10 completed. Estimated time: June 2023

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.body: EscrowDapp v2.0 is Live NowWe are happy to announce that we have finished our developments and integrations succesfully to bring EscrowDapp to the next level! After we got grants from TomoMasterDAO, we worked hard and we set our dapp as fully functional for escrow transactions on blockchain.What Is New?â€¢ We set minimum escrow value as $20.â€¢ We removed web2 based beta marketplace, integrated it to main dapp.â€¢ We added Fantom and Polygon networks.â€¢ We added new stable coins: PAXG, TRYB.----100 TOMO Airdrop + $150 Bounty To Celebrate The v2 LaunchWe have set an airdrop and a bounty to celebrate our milestone with you!Check details here: https://medium.com/@escrowdapp_com/escrowdapp-v2-0-is-live-now-ef6a22dc074f

comments.author: kriptokar
comments.created_time: May 18, 2023, 12:17:27 AMLast edit: May 18, 2023, 01:09:30 PM by kriptokar
comments.body: @YahooFinance: EscrowDapp Launches Blockchain-based Escrow Solutions for Secure and Transparent TransactionsNew blockchain-based escrow solutions are revolutionizing the way businesses conduct transactions by providing an extra layer of security and trust for all parties involved. Escrow transactions are particularly remarkable as they are carried out using smart contracts, which automate the process and eliminate the need for a reliable middleman.Read Full: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/escrowdapp-launches-blockchain-based-escrow-150845785.html
